posts.post_content: If there's one thing that makes me hopeful about this card, it's that it's flavor seems to indicate a Rabiah like area. Which means that, for all I know, this and [Juggernaut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Juggernaut)'s flavor texts could herald a return to Rabiah... Not likely, but you've gotta hope.
